title: Softskills Training
description:
During the Soft Skills Training for Cisco TAC, we focused on developing important interpersonal skills like communication, collaboration, empathy, conflict resolution, and prioritization. 

Led by Thomas Scott from Tide Changer, we took part in interactive sessions and role-play scenarios that helped us prepare for real-world customer support challenges. 
The program gave us practical strategies to improve our client interactions and support our ongoing professional growth in the TAC environment.
